intro: Rondeletia spinescens, commonly known as the spiny rondeletia, is a flowering plant native to South America. It is a member of the Rubiaceae family, which includes many ornamental and medicinal plants. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that range in color from white to pink. Its leaves are typically opposite and have a somewhat rough texture. Rondeletia spinescens thrives in shaded to partially shaded environments and is often found in tropical and subtropical regions.
